title: TrustLineFlags
description:
TrustLineFlags is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum TrustLineFlags { // issuer has authorized account to perform transactions with its credit AUTHORIZED_FLAG = 1, // issuer has authorized account to maintain and reduce liabilities for its // credit AUTHORIZED_TO_MAINTAIN_LIABILITIES_FLAG = 2, // issuer has specified that it may clawback its credit, and that claimable // balances created with its credit may also be clawed back TRUSTLINE_CLAWBACK_ENABLED_FLAG = 4 }; ```
